job.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer

a professional website attract customers sell their products and services and manage their work Our mission is to give our customers the tools insights and the people to transform their ideas and personal initiative into success To learn more about the company visit wwwGoDaddycombrbrstrongstrongLocation brbrstrongYour manager is in Maine but you can work remotely or near a GoDaddy office This position is not eligible to be performed in Alaska Colorado Mississippi North Dakota or the Virgin IslandsbrbrstronguWhat Youll Get To DobrbrustrongThis team is responsible for ensuring our various environments meet or exceed our Availability SLAs ensures patching compliance is maintained scales and builds new features amp tools as well as performs technical troubleshooting to address operational issues that arisebrbrWe have hundreds of services running on thousands of both physical and virtual hosts within our own data centers as well as external cloud providers on 6 continents Keeping the lights on with such a nimble team requires a particular skillset and mentality as well as a passion for automation and excellencebrbrstrongIn this role you willbrstrongul liRun and maintain both onprem and AWS workloadsli liAutomate common operational tasks such as patchingli liInterface with teams to provide operational assistance and perfectionli liDefine monitoring and visibility standards and drive the approach to adoptionli liProvide oncall support for our customers operational needsli liBe a technical leader for teams across GoDaddy often championing best of and experience with visibility tools such as Nagios Sensu Icinga2 Cloudwatch and Elasticli liKnowledge of and experience with configuration management tools such as Salt Chef Ansible and Puppetli
